Description:
Striking 10 month old Burbank beauty
Located in the tranquil Belmond on Clyde estate, we are proud to introduce this quality built Burbank home. Sure to impress the most particular of buyers, the functional floorplan boasts two separate living zones, a beautiful hostess kitchen and to top it off a fantastic entertainers area outside!
Features include:
- Generous Master suite with a large walk in robe plus ensuite featuring twin vanities.
- Three more spacious bedrooms – two with walk in robes and the third includes built in robes.
- Large open plan family living area with central kitchen and dining space.
- Stunning kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, walk in pantry, 900mm oven with five burner gas cooktop, waterfall stone benchtops with breakfast bar and plenty of cupboard space.
- Separate formal living area.
- Large decked entertainer's area overlooking a generous backyard for kids and pets to play.
- Double remote garage with internal access.
- Other features include ducted heating and downlights throughout, high ceilings, upgraded quality fittings to both the kitchen and showers, landscaped gardens back and front, and much, much more.
On top of the great features, contemporary design & street appeal this home offers, you'll also love all the abundance of facilities at your fingertips. Belmond is situated in the heart of the fastest growing suburb of Clyde and is only moments away from central Cranbourne and Berwick. Lush parks and open spaces make family time a breeze plus there is easy access to Shopping on Clyde, schools such as Clyde Primary, sports and recreation facilities– it's got it all!
To ensure you don't miss out on this amazing opportunity please make sure you contact us to organize an inspection!
Insights: 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
BELMOND ON CLYDE ESTATE: Wanting to be in a location that is family orientated, has easy access to all local amenities? then this is the block for you. This is definitely a great opportunity so take advantage of the Government Grants on offer and buy with confidence today!
This block is perfect to create your dream home or add to your property portfolio whilst enjoying the quality lifestyle on offer in Belmond on Clyde! This titled parcel of land measures app. 371m2. With plenty of award winning designs to pick from any builder would have a huge selection of floor plans sure to suit your current situation! What are you waiting for? Contact your builder today and get ready to start pouring the slab!
An intimate and quiet community, Belmond offers you the perfect escape right in the heart of Casey. With an array of shopping, community and education choices at your fingertips, this is the perfect place to call home.
With a picturesque central park and app. 3.7 hectares of open space all that will have the kids and pets happy for hours on end!
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne this sensational opportunity is only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre! With further shopping precincts in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club, local amenities are always going to be close by whilst the recently revamped Cranbourne Centro Shopping Centre offers an abundance of cafes and restaurants! Those of you who work or enjoy wining and dining in the CBD will certainly appreciate the nearby freeway facilities, it's only a brisk app. 45 minute drive away!
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call now before it's selling, selling..... SOLD!
MAKE AN ENQUIRY TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW!
Please note that land map and dimensions are approximant only and the buyer should make their own enquires.

Description:
An ideal location to invest in for the future
Approx. 5 Acres in a Fast Growing Suburb .Located approximately 48 km south-east from Melbourne's Central business district, this location provides both the tranquility and convenience.
With a wide choice of both state and independent schools in the suburb and surrounding suburb, this makes it a perfect place for young families to build their homes, knowing that there will be the right school for their children. For family relation and activities are Casey Fields ,Casey Race and Cranbourne Botanical Gardens. With Eden Rise Shopping Center and Fountain Gate shopping Center, for nearby shopping conveniences, this location cannot be more perfect for an investor.

Description:
643m2 - titled land in Eliston
Larger blocks are a true rarity these day and this fantastic corner block is a staggering 642m2 and is titled and ready to build on. Sited directly opposite the reserve with a wide frontage it offers the perfect opportunity to build a wide array of homes.
Eliston is a new masterplanned community. Providing a lifestyle with the best in community living. Features include:
- Major Town Centre
- Primary School & Childcare Centre
- 3 x neighbourhood parks including play areas with 'zones' for all ages
- Fibre to homes for fast NBN internet access
- Close to a range of established amenities including shopping, education, medical, recreation and public transport.
For further details on this superb allotment contact Mark Sewell or Rebecca Munjoma.

Description:
East facing, park facing
Located in the highly sought-after Pasadena estate is this beautiful home comes with all the bells and whistles. Only short walk to the local shopping centre and park just across the road and other amenities including the local schools, TAFE, public transport, community centre etc are just short drive away will brings all the convenience at your doorstep. The house proudly boasts: -
4 bedrooms, master with full ensuite and WIR's
2 living areas including the formal lounge and family plus the separate dining area
Spacious kitchen with plenty of storage space and walk in pantry
Double lock up garage with internal and remote access
Extras include: - gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double oven, spa bath, powder room, timber floors, stone benchtops, glass splashback, dishwasher, roller shutter doors, outdoor alfresco with timber deck, low maintenance front yard and back yard, quality curtains, blinds, light fittings and many more
Call now to inspect

Description:
Starting out in style
Located in the well sought-after Pasadena estate, this quality built Burbank home has features galore with nothing to do but move in and enjoy. Sure to impress the most particular of buyers, the modern features and convenient location makes it ideal as an investment or perfect for those looking for their first home!
Features include:
- Generous Master bedroom with ensuite plus a large walk in robe
- Open plan living with central kitchen and dining area
- Hostess kitchen includes stainless steel 900mm cooktop, oven, dishwasher, stone benchtops with breakfast bar, glass splash back and built in pantry
- Family bathroom with generous oversized shower
- Ducted heating throughout the home plus a split system to keep you cool in summer
- Single remote garage with internal access
- Other features include downlights throughout, beautiful decking to the side and rear of the home and much, much more
Pasadena estate is the place to be due to a true family friendly lifestyle. Beautiful children's parks and walking tracks offer plenty of space to explore, Casey fields and Casey RACE are only a stone throw away and all this is only a moment's drive to local schools such as St Thomas the Apostle Primary School and . Not to mention the property is literally across the road from Shopping on Clyde which features restaurants, cafes and a Coles supermarket – never drive to the shops again!

Description:
A Perfect Walk Score!
CLYDE: If you are on a hunt for a property offering outstanding value for money which is just minutes away from school, shops, parks and public transport yet quietly placed in a serene location then this just the right property for you! Located in the highly sought after Pasadena Estate, this nearly 5 year old Metricon home suit both first home buyers and investors alike.
Immediately upon enter, you will be impressed by the timber look flooring flowing from the entry through the rest of the living area. The master room comes with a full ensuite and a WIR where as the rest of the 2 bed rooms with generous proportions are with BIRs that is served by a large modern bathroom. The open plan living and dining is designed to enjoy the natural light all year around. The kitchen is a chef's delight that boasts of quality stainless steel appliances, island bench tops, a dishwasher and a generous walk-in pantry. The living and dining area overlooks the low maintenance garden that has access through the sliding doors.
The property is just a short stroll to the Shopping on Clyde and moments away from schools and parks. The Casey RACE and the Casey Fields are just a short distance away. It is almost not possible to find a turn key house in a fantastic neighbourhood than this lovely home. Come and view to believe!
Other Features Include:
-Ducted Heating
-Single car garage with internal access
-Quality blinds
-High ceilings
Clyde is located only a short drive from the freeway access and all amenities in the townships of Berwick and Cranbourne. The area is surrounded by multiple shopping centres. The town centre of Clyde offers a general store, post office and a community hall. Schools in the area include Clyde Primary, Hillcrest Christian College.
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and vendor expectations. You can view with confidence that vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.
**PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS**

Description:
JUST LIKE NEW!
Situated in the Belmond on Clyde estate sits this exceptional 2017 built family home with all the extras!
This 4 bedroom residence comes complete with a generous sized master with walk in robes and full ensuite fitted with extended shower space.
The hostess kitchen is a chef's dream and is complete with quality stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, 900mm range hood and a 5-burner cook top, tiled splash back, Caesar stone bench tops with ample cupboard/storage options. Not to mention the abundance of pantry space on offer, all this and a whole lot more overlooking the separate meals and living zone.
Those who like to entertain are bound to enjoy the multitude of separate living zones on offer. There is enough space for the entire family to enjoy!
Added extras include: ducted heating & split system cooling, paved driveway, neutral tones throughout, convenient blend of carpet and tiles and low maintenance gardens!
Step through the sliding doors and be greeted by your low maintenance rear yard and outdoor entertaining area, this will provide the perfect setting to sit back and relax after a long working week or to host friends and family.
Surrounded by top end properties, this is a tremendous opportunity for a family who insists on nothing but the best. Minutes away from Freeway access en route to the Melbourne CBD, the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey Fields football ground/Casey Race aquatic centre and Selandra Rise shopping centre!

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
ELISTON ESTATE, CLYDE: **PICTURESQUE PAVED COURTYARD, REFER TO THE DIRECTION DETAILS BELOW** Flawlessly designed with professional landscaping and complete to a standard far beyond most buyers' expectations, this display quality home is positioned within metres of picturesque parkland in the flourishing Eliston Estate. The modern facade further emphasises its contemporary edge and provides instant street appeal encouraging you to step inside!
Upon entry you are greeted by timber effect flooring, light paint tones and extras including LED lighting, high ceilings and feature doors which all add to the overall appeal.
From the entry hall you walk past the front sitting room, easily utilised as a home office, and head towards the open plan living/dining area. The hostess kitchen is one of the main selling points and is complete with 40mm stone benches/waterfall, stainless steel appliances, a mirrored glass splash back, wide fridge cavity and plenty of soft closing cupboard/storage space.
There are 3 genuine bedrooms, the master suite offering a shelved WIR, plus 2 bathrooms including a full ensuite - both complete with stone topped vanities, wall niches and floor to ceiling tiling!
Don't forget the host of bonuses including ducted heating, RC/SS air-conditioning, a double remote garage with internal access, off street parking plus a sun lit courtyard to complete the relaxed setting.
In an estate lined with parks, playgrounds and a proposed state Primary school you are within a short drive to freeway access and all of the amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne. You are also only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre! With additional shopping precincts in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club local amenities are always going to be close by, whilst the recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre offers an abundance of cafes and restaurants. Don't forget the proposed Cranbourne East train station and the existing ones situated right throughout the South East!
This is the perfect opportunity for first timers looking to break into the market, empty nesters and those looking to invest in one of the most popular estates in Clyde!
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call before it's SELLING, SELLING ..... SOLD!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.
DIRECTIONS: Enter Eliston Avenue. Turn left onto Pump House Crescent. Continue past the park on Pump House Crescent. Turn left onto Abundance Circuit. Crop Lane runs off Abundance Circuit.

Description:
Brand New Quality Home
We are proud to introduce a home that offers class and elegance with a combination of spectacular space, abundant accommodation and unrivaled luxury located in one of the most sought after Eliston Estate.
Built with attention to detail and with abundance of upgrades, this beautiful house is sure to impress at the very first moment you step in. The functional floorplan comprises 4 good sized bedrooms, 3 separate living areas, a stunning kitchen with big walk in pantry, alfresco & much more.
Features include:
-Large master bedroom with full ensuite, double vanities, 20mm Caesarstone benchtop, 6 Jet spa & a generous walk in robe
- other three bedrooms are of very generous size, two with their own BIR with sliding doors and the third one has its own WIR and are in close proximity to central bathroom & bath.
-3 spacious living areas; light filled formal lounge at the front, large open living with meal area adjoined to kitchen and rumpus/kids zone perfect for today’s social lifestyle, everyday living and entertaining extended family and friends.
- Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances; 900mm freestanding upright Westinghouse oven & rangehood
-Ceasarstone benchtop 40mm, glass splashback and large walk in pantry.
-Soft closure to drawers and cupboards
-Ducted heating
-Evaporative cooling
-Ducted vacuum
- Undercover alfresco overlooking a generous backyard, perfect to entertain friends and family.
- Double remote garage with internal and rear access.
Other features:
- Porcelain glazed reticulated tiles 600mmx 600mm
- Quality carpets
- High ceiling 2740mm
- Led downlights in entry, walkway, living and dining
- Exposed aggregate concrete in driveway & porch area
- 450 mm eves to the front facade
- Brickwork to all elevations
- Fly screens to all windows
- Capped gas point to Alfresco
- Capped hot/cold water point to Alfresco and drain point
- Fully fenced & side path
- NBN &recycled water
- Solar hot water system & much more.
Be sure to book your inspection today as homes with all these quality upgrades don’t come around that often.

Description:
Golden Opportunity Awaits with 2 Living Areas in The Pasadena Estate!
Situated within the much-admired Pasadena Estate, this divine family home is sure to impress the most particular of buyers with its functional floor plan and abundance of features, with nothing more to do but move in and enjoy or simply keep the house as an investment with the current wonderful tenants in place.
Behind its delightful landscaped frontage this property offers two separate living areas, formal lounge room off the entrance hall, 4 generous bedrooms all with built in robes, gorgeous master with full ensuite, double vanities plus a large walk-in robe, central family bathroom with single vanity, shower and bath facilities and separate toilet. Hostess white kitchen with stainless steel oven, dishwasher, Caesar stone bench-tops with breakfast bar, tiled splash back and huge walk-in pantry. The open plan living/dining area provides enough space for both relaxing and entertaining guests. Easy access to outside which offers low maintenance gardens and grassed backyard for the kids to play.
Further Features included in this home are:
- Neutral colour scheme throughout
- Evaporative cooling
- Gas ducted heating
- Mix of tiles and carpet flooring
- Remote double garage with internal access.
Pasadena estate is the place to be due to the close proximity to amenities. The beautiful parks and walking tracks offer plenty of space to explore, Casey fields and Casey RACE are only a stone throw away and all this is only a moment's drive to local schools. Not to mention the property is also just a short walk to Shopping on Clyde.

Description:
Entry level for investors & first home buyers
Situated a short walk from Clyde Shopping Centre, is this single story residence beams natural light and impressive interiors and exteriors.
- Expansive open plan family & meals area
- Spacious open plan kitchen with stainless appliances & dishwasher.
- Ducted heating, air-conditioning & LED lighting.
- 3 good sized bedrooms plus study nook
- Decked pergola area
- Single garage with remote control.
This as new residence is perfectly positioned to take full advantage of the proximity to the shops, pharmacy, cafes and restaurants in Clyde Shopping Centre, with bus stop (Route 897) literally minutes away from the home.

Description:
AUCTION CANCELLED SOLD PRIOR
Summer is here so why build and go through all the pain and time when you can purchase this 4 bedroom plus study home that is only 2 years young, which has everything already done and all the bells and whistles attached.
Inside you'll notice the contemporary décor of this "no expense spared" home and the expansive living areas, which will give all the members of the family an opportunity to each get their own space. The gorgeous Theatre room, open plan family room and upstairs retreat are terrific in stature and will host quiet nights in watching movies or families who invite all their neighbours and friends over to enjoy a social bbq.
The kitchen has been finished with stone benches, quality 900mm S/S appliances, dishwasher, overhead cupboards and a gorgeous window splash back for all that natural light to flow through. Adjoining the kitchen is a walk in pantry for all the Jamie Oliver's of the family and for extra storage.
Overlooking the kitchen is a huge meals area, which will fit a huge kings table. Adjacent to the meals area there is a gorgeous decked alfresco area, which is separated by quality bi-fold timber doors.
Entertaining the family is easy once you step passed the bi-fold doors. You instantly know there has been a lot of time, effort and money invested in the backyard with extensive decking around the solar heated in-ground swimming pool, exposed aggregate paths and low maintenance backdrop the owners have created.
The huge master bedroom comes with a generous WIR and Ensuite, while the 2nd and 3rd bedrooms also incorporates walk in robes to accommodate the teenagers of the family.
Extras in this tremendous size home include ducted vacuum, kicker vacuum in the kitchen, double garage with remote, 3 toilets which includes a down stairs powder room, ceiling fans, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and so much more.
Located in the pristine Pasadena Estate and close to schools "public and private", shops and public transport on a 512m2 block of land this property depicts what most Australians want when they buy a home. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity
